text: 11.28 Kis 12.21-30 Ne God nop gos lɨnɨŋɨd nɨm, Yislel binɨb okok kɨlop agek, kɨli ñɨn awl Pasopa apal ak, ñɨn ak chag sipsip ñɨluk pak sɨbogɨpal ak, anɨb ñɨn ak tɨkjakɨl gɨlak. Pen abe kɨlop agek, chag sipsip ñɨluk nɨkɨm ak dɨl, kanɨbtub kɨli okok wikel, ensel ap binɨb ñɨ ned tɨkɨlak okok paklɨnɨg, Yislel binɨb kal kɨlop ak apɨl paklɨnɨmuŋ tek ma lak.
